title: Italy : number of banks 2011 to 2018
summary: The population in Italy has been increasing annually and reached 10.23 million in 2018 , and these individuals were living in almost 740 million banks .
As with the growing population , the Number of banks were increasing annually as well , from 4.3 banks in 2011 , up to the 4.7 in 2011 .
Single household without children most common of the banks in Italy 2018 were single banks without children and amounted to around 1.8 billion .
